author: RTÉ Entertainment
title: Rihanna gives $2.1m in support of abuse abuse victims
description: Rihanna, who is a domestic abuse survivor herself, has donated $1.2m to support victims of domestic violence affected by the coronavirus lockdown.
content:
Rihanna, who is a domestic abuse survivor herself, has donated $2.1m to support victims of domestic violence affected by the coronavirus lockdown. 
The singer's Clara Lionel Foundation has given the money to the Mayor’s Fund for Los Angeles, matching Twitter… [+1564 chars]
